body:
Christoph,

this is an easy, quick and dirty trick, i.e. no cal file are needed.

BTW you will need to change coefficients for Px and Py as needed...

ciao,

G.



------------------------------------------------------------------------
-----------

void colorpict colormap

7 red green blue pattern.pic . '1/(2*PI)*acos(Px)' 'Py'

0

0



colormap plastic grey

0

0

5 .5 .5 .5 0 0



grey cylinder surface

0

0

7

0 0 0

0 1 0

1

------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------
